sections.mainText: Backed up by a community of 1000+ members
sections.secondText: We are already building the largest multiplatform e-commerce community -from Latin America to the world. Here you will find:

cards.text: A self-paced bootcamp for students. Learn webdev for ecommerce from scratch using our modern technologies.
cards.title: deco.cx camp

cards.text: We are listing all fulltime job positions we find in the commerce ecosystem, and you can share yours.
cards.title: Job positions

cards.text: Monetize your skills by completing short-term projects and achieving specific outcomes for clients using deco.cx.
cards.title: Bounties

cards.text: We offer specialized support to help solve technical issues and answer questions about our platform and technologies.
cards.title: Support
